name: Skelscape
description:
3D-runner game where you must upgrade your game to make it better. Buy health-, jump- and eyeupgrades but also stuff like graphics and settings-button!

Creators:

BlockyBear (programmer, designer, 3D-modeller)

Minjutin (programmer, designer)

JHMota (programmer designer)

Eräs Kristin (2D-artist, 3D-modeller, designer)
